column1: A petition of appeal made under section 3ID of industrial Disputes
Act against an order made by a labour tribunal, shall be filed within

a  period  of  thirty  days 
(including  the  day  on  which  the  order

appealed 
from  was  made,  but  excluding  Sundays  and  Public
Holidays)  of  the  date  of  the  making  of  the  order  from  which  the
